title: (x) inline geometric "Acknowledgements" - Nobel {Yves}
content:
anyone know what this font is? thanks very much

comments.content: This looks like [Nobel](http://web.archive.org/web/20080215235219/http:/www.dutchtypelibrary.nl/NobelRegular.html), but I don’t know if an inline version was digitised...
thanks for that. will be more specific in my subject field next time, sorry!
